Description
If you play Skyrim with a controller and want to be able to press a button on the controller to take footage or snap a screenshot. You can use this for a Xbox 360 or Xbox one controller. You will need to download a program called Pinnacle Gamer Profiler. It will cost roughly $20 depending on your country but when you first download it comes with a free 14 day trail so if you don't like mod after a few days you can uninstall it and not pay a dime. The controls are the following.

LT-Right Click
RT-Left Click
Back + Right Joystick-Mouse
[Guide Button-Steam Overlay-(No Key Pressed)]
[Guide Button + LT-Record Video-F11]
[Guide Button + RT-Take Screenshot-F12]

If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/708/?]here[/url]. If you play Oblivion also look at my [url=http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/28902]Oblivion Xbox 360 Gamepad[/url]. And if you play Elder Scrolls Online also look at my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/elderscrollsonline/mods/19/?]Online Xbox One Gamepad UI[/url].


Requirements
Skyrim
Xbox 360 Wired Gamepad (If you wish to use a Xbox 360 wired controller)
Xbox 360 Wireless Gamepad + Xbox 360 Receiver (If you wish to use a Xbox 360 wireless controller)
Xbox One + Micro USB Cable*(If you wish to use a Xbox One controller wired)
Xbox One Gamepad + Reciever (If you wish to use a Xbox One controller wirelessly)
[url=http://pinnaclegameprofiler.com/]Pinnacle Gamer Profiler[/url]
[url=http://www.fraps.com/]Fraps[/url] (Optional)

Installing
Install the software that comes with your controller first. Then download [url=http://pinnaclegameprofiler.com/]Pinnacle Gamer Profiler[/url]. For Pinnacle download the file and import the Profile that matches your controller description. If your running Skyrim in Compatibility Mode you must run Pinnacle in compatibility mode. Also if Skyrim is ran as an administrator you will most likely run Pinnacle as an administrator. Then download [url=http://www.fraps.com/]Fraps[/url] and change the Fraps hotkeys to the following. To disable the Xbox 360 popup window when you press the Xbox Guide Button press the Windows Key + R and type msconfig. Then go to Startup and right click on XboxStat.exe and disable it.

Video Capture Hotkey-F11
Screen Capture Hotkey-F12

For those who have Windows 10 and want to disable the annoying Windows Game Bar which will conflict with the Steam Overlay do the following Steps.

1-Go into Steam and press the Windows Key + G
2-Check off the box that says Yes, this is a game
3-Then click on the Gear Icon
4-Uncheck the Open Game Bar using (Xbox Logo) on a Controller


Running
To run Pinnacle profile make sure that you attach the TESV.exe with the profile and from there when you launch the game it will automatically load the profile for the game. You must run Steam in Big Picture mode to get the Steam Overlay.

Playing Skyrim On A TV
If you want go [url=http://hookpctotv.com/]Here[/url] to find out how to play Skyrim on your TV.
